claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alpha Centauri  (  α Centauri , abbreviated Alpha Cen , α Cen  )  is the closest star system to the Solar System , being 4.37 ly from the Sun .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It consists of three stars : the double star Alpha Centauri A  (  also named Rigil Kentaurus  )  and Alpha Centauri B together with a small and faint red dwarf , Alpha Centauri C  (  also named Proxima Centauri  )  , that may be gravitationally bound to the other two .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: To the unaided eye , the two main components appear as a single point of light with an apparent visual magnitude of − 0.27 , forming the brightest star in the southern constellation of Centaurus and is the third-brightest star in the night sky , outshone only by Sirius and Canopus .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alpha Centauri A  (  α Cen A  )  has 1.1 times the mass and 1.519 times the luminosity of the Sun , while Alpha Centauri B  (  α Cen B  )  is smaller and cooler , at 0.907 times the Sun 's mass and 0.445 times its visual luminosity .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During the pair 's 79.91-year orbit about a common centre , the distance between them varies from about that between Pluto and the Sun to that between Saturn and the Sun .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Proxima Centauri  (  α Cen C  )  is at the slightly smaller distance of 1.30 pc from the Sun , making it the closest star to the Sun , even though it is not visible to the naked eye .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The separation of Proxima from Alpha Centauri AB is about 15000 AU , equivalent to 500 times the size of Neptune 's orbit .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Proxima Centauri b , an Earth-sized exoplanet in the habitable zone of Proxima Centauri , has been detected .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alpha Centauri  (  α Centauri , abbreviated Alpha Cen , α Cen  )  is the closest star system to the Solar System , being 4.37 ly from the Sun .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alpha Centauri  (  or α Cen  )  is a star system and the collective name of three stars in that system .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As one of the brightest stars in Earth 's night sky , and the closest known star system to the Sun , the Alpha Centauri system plays an important role in many fictional works of literature , popular culture , television , and film .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Alpha Centauri , a double star system with the binary designation Alpha Centauri AB , is the brightest visible object in the southern constellation Centaurus .

claim: Alpha Centauri is a star system.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In Stars within ten parsecs of the Sun by Louise Freeland Jenkins  (  1937  )  its parallax is 0.34 arcsec  (  distance is 2.94 pc or 9.59 ly  )  , and it is the 6th closest star system after Alpha Centauri , Barnard 's Star , Wolf 359 , Lalande 21185 and Sirius .
